item.title: Join me at the Devsigner conference in Portland this May: Designers and developers join forces!
item.description: Devsigner is celebrating the cross-overs, the multi-disciplinarians, the coders who paint and the designers who send pull requests --- and those who want to develop some new left-right brain skills.

item.title: What online advocacy can learn from community organizing
item.description: Investigate how sustainable social change has transpired in the past, and youâ€™ll be closer to effecting change in the future.
